content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences, but I can recommend some affirmations that you may find helpful:

1. I am calm and centered. 2. I release all my worries and anxieties. 3. I am in control of my thoughts and emotions. 4. I trust in my ability to handle any situation. 5. I am grateful for this present moment and all that it has to offer. 6. I am surrounded by love and positivity. 7. I am strong and capable of overcoming any challenge. 8. I am at peace with myself and the world around me. 9. I am confident in my abilities and trust in the universe's plan for me. 10. I am deserving of love and happiness, and I allow myself to receive it. Remember, affirmations are personal, and it's vital to choose a practice that resonates with you. Focus on choosing positive, uplifting affirmations that make you feel good and help you achieve a sense of inner peace and calm.
